DOC.brief_summary: Complications mesh procedure ( i.e . insertion tension-free vaginal tape ( TVT ) , trans-obturator tape ( TOT ) suprapubic sling ( SS ) ) use surgical treatment stress urinary incontinence cause major concern around world . The investigator aim conduct retrospective cohort study use administrative inpatient data Hospital Episode Statistics ( HES ) database determine complication first-time surgical mesh procedure treatment stress urinary incontinence ( SUI ) woman treat National Health Service ( NHS ) hospital England discharge hospital 1st April 2007 31st March 2015 . The primary outcome measure number type complication ( occur peri-procedurally , within 30 day mesh procedure occur follow-up ) . Additional outcome record include : number type mesh procedure , include potentially confound concomitant procedure .
